ya5.2.1:244.1: Yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṁ uppajjissati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ uppajjitthāti?
ya5.2.1:245.1_0: Suddhāvāsānaṁ dutiye citte vattamāne tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ uppajjissati, no ca
ya5.2.1:245.1_1: tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ uppajjittha. Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.1:245.1_2: ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ tattha maggasaccañca uppajjissati samudayasaccañca uppajjittha.
ya5.2.1:246.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjittha tassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjissatīti? Natthi.
ya5.2.1:247.1: Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya5.2.1:248.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjittha tassa maggasaccaṁ nuppajjissatīti? Natthi.
ya5.2.1:249.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ nuppajjissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya5.2.1:250.1: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjittha tassa maggasaccaṁ nuppajjissatīti? Natthi.
ya5.2.1:251.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ nuppajjissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya5.2.1:253.1: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjissatīti? Uppajjissati.
ya5.2.1:254.1: Yassa vā pana yattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya5.2.1:255.1: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha maggasaccaṁ nuppajjissatīti? Uppajjissati.
ya5.2.1:256.1: Yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya5.2.1:257.1: Yassa yattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha maggasaccaṁ nuppajjissatīti?
ya5.2.1:258.1_0: Suddhāvāsānaṁ dutiye citte vattamāne tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjittha, no
ya5.2.1:258.1_1: ca tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ nuppajjissati. Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccañca
ya5.2.1:259.1: Yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjitthāti?
ya5.2.1:260.1_0: Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṁ arahantānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti āpāyikānaṁ
ya5.2.1:260.1_1: tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjittha.
ya5.2.1:260.1_2: Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha maggasaccañca nuppajjissati samudayasaccañca nuppajjittha.
